Actions.Name: When a custom action is sent in a group
Actions.Description: This operation is triggered when someone creates a custom action on a group.

Actions.Name: When someone responds to a custom action
Actions.Description: This operation is triggered when someone responds to a custom action posted on a group.

Actions.Name: Add an existing group as subgroup
Actions.Description: This operation allows you to add an existing group as subgroup to another group.

Actions.Name: Add subscriber to group
Actions.Description: This operation allows you to add subscribers to a group.

Actions.Name: Add user to group
Actions.Description: This operation allows you to add a user to a group.

Actions.Name: When there is an announcement sent in a group
Actions.Description: This operation is triggered when someone sends an announcement action to a group.

Actions.Name: When there is an attachment sent in a group
Actions.Description: This operation is triggered when someone sends an attachment action to a group.

Actions.Name: Create a group
Actions.Description: This operation allows you to create a Kaizala group.

Actions.Name: Create a subgroup
Actions.Description: This operation allows creation of a subgroup within a group.

Actions.Name: Deletes a webhook
Actions.Description: Deletes a webhook

Actions.Name: When a group is added as a member to a group

Actions.Description: This operation is triggered when someone removes a subgroup from a group.

Actions.Name: When a member is added to a group

Actions.Name: When a member is removed from a group
Actions.Description: This operation is triggered when someone removes a member from a group.

Actions.Description: This operation allows you to post like or comment to a message in a specific Kaizala group that you’re a member of.

Actions.Name: Send text message to a group

Actions.Name: Send reply to a message
Actions.Description: Send reply to a message.

Actions.Name: When a survey is sent in a group
Actions.Description: This operation is triggered when a survey is created on a group.

Actions.Name: When someone responds to a survey
Actions.Description: This operation is triggered when someone responds to an existing survey posted on a group.

Actions.Name: When a text message is sent on a group
Actions.Description: This operation is triggered when someone sends a text message on a group.

Actions.Name: Upload a media file
Actions.Description: This operation allows you to upload a media file and generates MediaResource which can be used in other APIs to send data.

Actions.Name: Upload media from attachment
Actions.Description: This operation allows you to upload the given media from attachment and generates MediaResource which can be used in other APIs to send data.

Actions.Name: Upload media from url
Actions.Description: This operation allows you to upload the given media from URL and generates MediaResource which can be used in other APIs to send data.

Actions.Description: This operation is triggered when an existing group member registers on Kaizala. In Kaizala, group admin(s) can add user even if he is not on Kaizala
